name: Weddings
description: Celebrate the union of two people in love with a beautiful wedding ceremony and reception.

name: Birthday Parties
description: Mark another year of life with a fun and memorable birthday party for friends and family.

name: Anniversaries
description: Commemorate years of togetherness and love with an anniversary celebration.

name: Engagement Parties
description: Share the joy of an engagement and the promise of a lifetime together with friends and family.

name: Retirement Parties
description: Bid farewell to a career and welcome the relaxation of retirement with a retirement party.

name: Baby Shower
description: Celebrate the upcoming arrival of a new bundle of joy with a baby shower for the expectant parents.
